title: WordPress Scraper · Apify
name: WordPress Scraper
full_readme:
Welcome To WordPress Scraper

About WordPress

WordPress (also known as WP or WordPress.org) is a web content management system. It was originally created as a tool to publish blogs but has evolved to support publishing other web content, including more traditional websites, mailing lists and Internet forum, media galleries, membership sites, learning management systems and online stores. Available as free and open-source software, WordPress is among the most popular content management systems – it was used by 42.8% of the top 10 million websites as of October 2021.[4][5]

About This Actor

Scrape blog, article, news, author, products. media, images from a WordPress website. Format content as HTML or Plain Text (Markdown)

Important Notes: For this Actor to work, The WordPress must be installed on target website.

Tutorial

... almost there ...
readme_summary: Scrape contents from WordPress websites. This Apify Actor allows you to scrape blog, article, news, author, products, media, and images from a WordPress website. The scraped content can be formatted as HTML or Plain Text (Markdown). Please note that the target website must have WordPress installed for this Actor to work.
